mapper.select:
select * from fault
status != 12 and status > 2
and date_format(approval_pass_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(approval_pass_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and line_code = #{lineCode}

select * from fault f left join cs_subsystem cs on cs.system_code = f.sub_system_code left join cs_line cl on cl.line_code = f.line_code left join cs_station ct on ct.station_code = f.station_code left join sys_user s on s.username = f.appoint_user_name
f.status > 2
and date_format(f.approval_pass_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{condition.startDate},'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(f.approval_pass_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{condition.endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and f.line_code = #{condition.lineCode}
and f.major_code in
#{item}
and f.status != 12
and f.status > 2
and date_format(f.happen_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{condition.todayStartDate},'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(f.happen_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{condition.todayEndDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and f.status > 2
and f.status = 12
and date_format(f.end_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{condition.todayStartDate},'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(f.end_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{condition.todayEndDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
group by f.id

select * from fault f left join cs_subsystem cs on cs.system_code = f.sub_system_code left join cs_line cl on cl.line_code = f.line_code left join cs_station ct on ct.station_code = f.station_code left join sys_user s on s.username = f.appoint_user_name
f.status > 2
and f.line_code = #{condition.lineCode}
and f.major_code in
#{item}
and f.status != 12
and f.status > 2
and date_format(f.happen_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{condition.startDate},'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(f.happen_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{condition.endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and f.status > 2
and f.status = 12
and date_format(f.end_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{condition.startDate},'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(f.end_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{condition.endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(f.happen_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{condition.todayStartDate},'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(f.happen_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{condition.todayEndDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and f.status > 2
and f.status = 12
and date_format(f.end_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{condition.todayStartDate},'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(f.end_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{condition.todayEndDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
group by f.id

select * from fault f left join cs_subsystem cs on cs.system_code = f.sub_system_code left join cs_line cl on cl.line_code = f.line_code left join cs_station ct on ct.station_code = f.station_code left join sys_user s on s.username = f.appoint_user_name
f.status > 2
and date_format(f.approval_pass_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(f.approval_pass_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and f.line_code = #{lineCode}
and f.major_code in
#{item}
group by f.id

select * from fault f left join cs_subsystem cs on cs.system_code = f.sub_system_code left join cs_line cl on cl.line_code = f.line_code left join cs_station ct on ct.station_code = f.station_code left join sys_user s on s.username = f.appoint_user_name
f.status > 2
and f.line_code = #{lineCode}
and date_format(f.approval_pass_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(f.approval_pass_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and f.major_code in
#{item}
group by f.id

select * from fault f left join cs_line cl on f.line_code = cl.line_code
f.status > 2
and date_format(f.approval_pass_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(f.approval_pass_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and f.major_code in
#{item}

select cs.system_name,f.sub_system_code,f.line_code,f.happen_time,f.end_time, sum(TIMESTAMPDIFF(minute,f.happen_time,f.end_time)) as repairTime from fault f left join cs_subSystem cs on f.sub_system_code = cs.system_code
f.status > 2
and date_format(f.approval_pass_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(f.approval_pass_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
and f.major_code in
#{item}
group by f.sub_system_code

select cs.system_name,d.system_code,d.code,d.major_code,d.name,count(code) as deviceNumber from device d left join cs_subSystem cs on d.system_code = cs.system_code
d.scrap_flag = 0
and d.major_code in
#{item}
group by d.system_code

select s.id as userId, s.realname, frp.user_name, f.approval_pass_time, fr.recevice_time, fr.end_time, fr.assign_time, sum(TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,IFNULL(fr.recevice_time,fr.assign_time),fr.end_time))-(SELECT SUM(IFNUll(op.hang_up_time,0)) FROM operation_process op WHERE op.fault_code = frp.`fault_code`) as duration FROM fault_repair_participants frp LEFT JOIN sys_user s ON s.username = frp.user_name LEFT JOIN fault f ON f.CODE = frp.fault_code left join fault_repair_record fr on fr.id = frp.fault_repair_record_id
fr.del_flag = 0
AND f.approval_pass_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
group by s.id

select s.id as userId, s.realname, fr.appoint_user_name, f.approval_pass_time, fr.recevice_time, fr.end_time, fr.assign_time, sum(TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,IFNULL(fr.recevice_time,fr.assign_time),fr.end_time))-(SELECT SUM(IFNUll(op.hang_up_time,0)) FROM operation_process op WHERE op.fault_code = fr.`fault_code`) as duration from fault_repair_record fr left join sys_user s on s.username = fr.appoint_user_name left join fault f on f.code = fr.fault_code
fr.del_flag = 0
AND f.approval_pass_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
group by s.id

select assort_time from t_work_log where del_flag = 0 and assort_time is not null and assort_time != " " and confirm_status=1 and org_id = #{orgId} and date_format(submit_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN date_format( #{startTime} ,'%Y-%m-%d') AND date_format( #{endTime} ,'%Y-%m-%d')

select assort_time from t_work_log where del_flag = 0 and confirm_status = 1 and assort_time is not null and assort_time != " " and assort_ids LIKE concat('%', #{userId}, '%') and date_format(submit_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN date_format( #{startTime} ,'%Y-%m-%d') AND date_format( #{endTime} ,'%Y-%m-%d')

select count(id) as constructorsNum, count(id) as num1 from t_work_log where del_flag = 0 and confirm_status = 1 and assort_ids LIKE concat('%', #{userId}, '%') and date_format(submit_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN date_format( #{startTime} ,'%Y-%m-%d') AND date_format( #{endTime} ,'%Y-%m-%d')

select s.id as userId, fr.id as frrId from sys_user s left join fault_repair_record fr on s.username = fr.appoint_user_name and fr.del_flag = 0 left join fault f on f.code = fr.fault_code where s.del_flag = 0 and s.org_id = #{orgId} AND date_format(f.approval_pass_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN date_format(#{startTime} ,'%Y-%m-%d') AND date_format(#{endTime} ,'%Y-%m-%d') group by s.id

select s.id as userId, fr.id as frrId, IFNULL(sum(TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,IFNULL(fr.recevice_time,fr.assign_time),fr.end_time))-(SELECT SUM(IFNUll(op.hang_up_time,0)) FROM operation_process op WHERE op.fault_code = f.`code`),0) as duration from sys_user s left join fault_repair_participants frp on s.username = frp.user_name left join fault_repair_record fr on frp.fault_repair_record_id = fr.id and fr.del_flag = 0 left join fault f on f.code = fr.fault_code where s.del_flag = 0 and s.org_id = #{orgId} AND date_format(f.approval_pass_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN date_format(#{startTime} ,'%Y-%m-%d') AND date_format(#{endTime} ,'%Y-%m-%d') group by s.id

select IFNULL(sum(TIMESTAMPDIFF(second,IFNULL(fr.recevice_time,fr.assign_time),fr.end_time))-(SELECT SUM(IFNUll(op.hang_up_time,0)) FROM operation_process op WHERE op.fault_code = f.`code`),0) as duration from sys_user s left join fault_repair_participants frp on s.username = frp.user_name left join fault_repair_record fr on frp.fault_repair_record_id = fr.id and fr.del_flag = 0 left join fault f on f.code = fr.fault_code where s.del_flag = 0 and s.id = #{userId} AND date_format(f.approval_pass_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN date_format( #{startTime} ,'%Y-%m-%d') AND date_format( #{endTime} ,'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT COUNT(twl.id) as constructorsNum from sys_depart sd left join sys_user s on s.org_code = sd.org_code left join t_work_log twl on s.id in (twl.assort_ids) and twl.del_flag = 0 and twl.confirm_status=1 where sd.del_flag =0 and sd.id =#{orgId} and date_format(twl.submit_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN date_format( #{startTime} ,'%Y-%m-%d') AND date_format( #{endTime} ,'%Y-%m-%d')
